trans-unit.source: Contains contextual state information for a designer, such as the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações de estado contextuais para um estruturador, tais como o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This includes permanent state information, such as the list of services running in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Isto inclui informações de estado permanente, como a lista de serviços em execução no designer.

trans-unit.source: It also includes transient state consisting of context items including the set of currently selected objects as well as the editing tool being used to manipulate objects on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Também inclui o estado transitório constituídas por itens de contexto, incluindo o conjunto de objetos atualmente selecionados, bem como a ferramenta de edição a ser utilizado para manipular objetos a superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: The EditingContext represents the communication boundary that is shared between the hosting application and the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/add/includes/wfd1-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O EditingContext representa o limite de comunicação que é partilhado entre a aplicação de alojamento e o [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/add/includes/wfd1-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The EditingContext was implemented as a concrete class for ease of use.
trans-unit.target: O EditingContext foi implementado como uma classe concreta facilidade de utilização.

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A> to use customized managers derived from <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>.
trans-unit.target: Substituir <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A>e <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A>a utilizar gestores personalizados e <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the context item manager that is returned by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items*> property.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de contexto do Gestor de item que é devolvido pelo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items*>propriedade.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> that supports delayed activation of design editor managers through the declaration of a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> attribute on the design editor manager.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida cria um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>que suporta um atraso de ativação de gestores de editor de design através da declaração de um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback>atributo no Gestor de editor de estrutura.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activites.Design.ContextItemManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activites.Design.ContextItemManager>.</xref:System.Activites.Design.ContextItemManager>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the service manager to be returned from the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services*> property.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do service manager, devem ser devolvidos a partir de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services*>propriedade.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services*>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> that supports delayed activation of design editor managers through the declaration of a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> attribute on the design editor manager.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida cria um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager>que suporta um atraso de ativação de gestores de editor de design através da declaração de um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback>atributo no Gestor de editor de estrutura.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Immediately releases any unmanaged resources used by the object.
trans-unit.target: Versões imediatamente a quaisquer recursos geridos utilizados pelo objeto.

trans-unit.source: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by the current <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Imediatamente liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo atual <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object is being disposed of; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the object is finalizing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este objeto está a ser eliminado do; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se está a finalizar o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> method is called or when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> object is finalized and collected by the garbage collector of the Microsoft .NET common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*>método é denominado ou quando o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"> </xref> objeto está finalizado e recolhido pelo garbage collector do Microsoft .NET comuns idioma tempo de execução.</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the local collection of context items stored by the current editing context.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a recolha local de itens de contexto armazenado pela edição contexto atual.

trans-unit.source: The Items collection is for data that is shared between a host and the designer.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de itens é para os dados que são partilhados entre um anfitrião e o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: This data provides the mechanism needed to hook into subscription and change notification.
trans-unit.target: Estes dados fornece o mecanismo de necessárias para estabelecer subscrição e a notificação de alteração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager"></xref> collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref> objects used in this editing context.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager"> </xref> coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"> </xref> objetos utilizados neste contexto de edição.

trans-unit.source: Returns the service manager used in the current editing context.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o service manager utilizado no contexto de edição atual.

trans-unit.source: Services represent functionality that is either provided by the host for the designer to use or that is used by the designer to make functionality available to all designers within the editor.
trans-unit.target: Serviços representam funcionalidades que está é fornecido pelo anfitrião para o estruturador para utilizar ou que é utilizado pelo estruturador para disponibilizar a funcionalidade para todos os designers dentro do editor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager"></xref> used in this editing context.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager"> </xref> utilizado neste contexto de edição.
